de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.components.interpreter
Class ContentInterpreter

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.interpreter.ExpressionInterpreterImpl<Content>
      de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.components.interpreter.ContentInterpreter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpressionInterpreter<Content>
public class ContentInterpreter
extends ExpressionInterpreterImpl<Content>

Special interpreter class to interpret content.

The grammar production rule of the expression is:

content ::= content ( ++ | -- | == ) content

content ::= { query-expression }

content ::= if path-expression then content [ else content ]

content ::= tm-content (3)

content ::= xml-content (4)

content ::= path-expression-1 || path-expression-2 (5) ==> if path-expression-1 then { path-expression-1 } else { path-expression-2 }

content ::= path_expression (6) ==> { path_expression }

Author:
Sven Krosse

interpret

public QueryMatches interpret(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                              IContext context,
                              java.lang.Object... optionalArguments)
                       throws TMQLRuntimeException
Method called to interpret the current expression.

Parameters:
runtime - the runtime
context - the context
optionalArguments - any optional arguments
Returns:
the results of this expression as QueryMatches
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if querying fails

interpretSetOperation

private QueryMatches interpretSetOperation(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                           IContext context,
                                           java.lang.Object... optionalArguments)
                                    throws TMQLRuntimeException
The method is called to interpret the given sub-expression by using the given runtime. The interpretation will call the sub-expression if the given expression isn't a leaf in parsing-tree.

The interpretation will transform the value on top of the stack and put its results also on top.

Parameters:
runtime - the runtime which contains all necessary information for querying process
context - the current querying context
optionalArguments - optional arguments
Returns:
the query matches
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if interpretation fails
